user.name: Kurai
user.bio:
Luau & Lua. (https://luau-lang.org/)
With a bit of JS, Node.js, jQuery and MySQL.

node.name: Dictionary
node.description: This is a Dictionary class that can be used in various ways. It provides easy access to methods actually ATTACHED to the dictionary you initialize.

node.name: Knit-with-Rodux
node.description: A knit boilerplate I use for most games I create. It uses Rodux which is a central state management library and can be extremely helpful (has its ups and downs).

node.name: Array
node.description: Similar to the array prototype in JavaScript. Designed for easy use without even thinking you're using an external module.

node.name: Richify
node.description: Richify offers an easy function to take options and generates a text fully compatible with Roblox's new RichText. Based off of another module, just redone to make it far less complicated.
